input: What does Section 102 of the IPC define?
target: Section 102 defines the commencement and continuance of the right of private defense of the body.

input: When does the right of private defense begin under Section 102?
target: The right begins as soon as there is a reasonable apprehension of danger to the body.

input: When does the right of private defense end under Section 102?
target: The right ends when the threat or danger ceases to exist.

input: What is an example of Section 102 in action?
target: Defending oneself from an attacker until they retreat is justified under Section 102.

input: What is the significance of Section 102?
target: Section 102 ensures clarity on when the right to private defense starts and ends.
